data_list.title: Department transfer
data_list.subTitle: Java Architecture and Application LifeLifecycle Management - Software Engineer
contributions: Developed the reporting information system of R.O.C government(Taiwan) about household registration statistic.
Assisted to upgrade the  Household Registration Information System of R.O.C(Taiwan)

data_list.title: Join to International Integrated Systems, Inc. (IISI) (2015/09 - 2017/06)
data_list.subTitle: Intelligent Transportation System - Software Engineer
contributions: Implemented the protocal for collecting vehicle's data from roadside control devices, including e-Tag, AVI.
Developed APIs based on Java RMI, provide vehicle's data to other services for calculating.

Developed the various vehicle traveling time algorithm against the city or road characteristics, including actual and predictive traveling time, and provide to road user via CMS(Changeable Message Signs).
Constructed system execution environment via Docker, improve the system shifting more efficiently and conveniently.
Developed the RWD website by using jQuery and Bootstrap, use to monitor traveling time of road and status of data collecting.
Developed addition information about vehicle, such as the slowest and stationary vehicle.

data_list.title: Graduated from National Yunlin University of Science and Technology (2013 - 2015)
data_list.subTitle: Master of Information Management
contributions: Department of Management Information System - Administrator of Web Server, DNS, Mail Server.
Journal of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences, Vol 13, No.2 (2017-06) - An Adaptive Programming Learning Environment.

data_list.title: Graduated from Chung Hua University (2009 - 2013)
data_list.subTitle: Bachelor of Information Management
contributions: Intern at Information System and Security Research Center(ISSRC).
Represented department of Management Information System for the 2012 International ICT Innovative Services Awards competition(Top 10).

data_list.title: 2017 ThirtySix
data_list.description: ThirtySix is the web-base application for restaurant which can instanly monitor food delivering progress and customer dining time from seat map.

data_list: Monitoring status of restaurant, such as seat usage, customer dining time, progress of food delivering.
Every changes are instanly reflect on all screens.

data_list.title: 2017 ThirtySeven
data_list.description: ThirtySeven provide RESTful APIs which same with ThirtySix's back end.

data_list.title: 2018 ThirtySeven-React-Smile
data_list.description: We develop the single page application(SPA) for operator to manage the restaurant.

data_list: Integrate RESTful APIs provided by ThirtySeven.
Organize seats on map by drag and drop icon directly.
Monitoring status of restaurant, such as seat usage, customer dining time, progress of food delivering.
Every changes are instanly reflect on all screens.

data_list.title: 2017 tayal
data_list.description: Tayal provides RESTful APIs for endpoint. The system administrator can manage metadata of music video and the user can search what they want about music video through tayal APIs. In addition, we're trying to figure out the potential music video which the user had never watched but may like.

data_list: Provide RESTful APIs for endpoint, such as website.
Manage metadata of music video through APIs.
User can manage their playlist through APIs.

data_list.title: 2017 sylvia/syliva-admin
data_list.description: We develop the single page application(SPA) to manage the metadata of music video. We also develop the formal SPA for user to watch the music video, and let them can access their data through their mobile device.

data_list: Integrate RESTful APIs provided by tayal.
The system administrator can manage metadata of music video.
The user can watch music video and manage their playlist.

data_list.title: 2013 PLWeb
data_list.description: PLWeb provides better support for teaching programming in computer classrooms, also can be used  as a self-learning tool.

data_list: Support instructors create programming excercises conveniently.
Monitoring students learning progress and the time spent on each excercise.
Snapshots of students codes, and help the instructor to understand students difficults.
Adaptive learning system help students leanring efficiently.

data_list.title: 2012 iSay
data_list.description: We Developed a website for user recording their diary by using speech, user can upload images to rich the diary. iSay also has the social feature for notifing users their friend post a new diary. iSay also has Android version.

data_list: Notifing users if their friend post a new diary.
